summary: Liam, your consistent performance across all subjects is truly commendable. Especially in English and History, where you've shown strong understanding. Your ability to submit solid written work consistently reflects your Goal: Aim to increase your class participation and focus on completing all assignments on time. Also, try to improve your understanding in Science and Math.
